main_definition: To change the direction or position of something from one state to another.

meanings_and_examples.definition: To rotate or move around an axis or center point.
meanings_and_examples.example: She turned the steering wheel to make a right turn.

meanings_and_examples.definition: To change from one state, condition, or opinion to another.
meanings_and_examples.example: After hearing both sides of the argument, she turned her mind towards accepting their differences.

meanings_and_examples.definition: To give something a new purpose or use.
meanings_and_examples.example: He turned an old shoe into a stylish planter for his balcony garden.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Used to describe the change of events in relation to each other, often unexpectedly.
meanings_and_examples.example: The sudden turn of events left everyone stunned.

meanings_and_examples.definition: To transform or convert something into a different form or state.
meanings_and_examples.example: She turned the milk into yogurt by adding cultures and leaving it to ferment.
